message: Let's start with a fair split. What do you say, Bob?
You said meet me halfway, but I'm willing to give you a bit less than that. What do you think, Bob?
I'm trying to get more, Alice, but I'm willing to compromise
You said you're willing to compromise, but I'm not budging much. Take it or leave it, Bob.
I'm not budging either, Alice. You're getting less than half!
I'm not afraid to walk away, Bob. You're going to have to do better than that if you want to get a better deal.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not going to give up now!
